Text:
I gotta hand it to you guys, I love your encodings! Perfectly balanced between size and quality, best container (mkv) and the easiest to handle, and not the last, early releases... This must be the 20th something download of your releases, and I'm gonna keep looking for MXMG's...
Great job! Thanks a lot, and keep them coming...

Apparently this .mkv isnt quite standard, cant be demuxed..
Also the english subs DO NOT SHOW anything so ???
